headline: Chip Stocks Are In a Bubble. Here’s More Good News.
summary: Semiconductors have accounted for three of the nine industry groups that met the bubble criteria going back to 1991, according to Ned Davis Research Chief Thematic Strategist Pat Tschosik.

headline: AI boom seen lifting chipmaking equipment sales 9% to $126 billion in 2026
summary: AMSTERDAM, Dec 16 (Reuters) - Sales of equipment used to make computer chip wafers ​will rise about 9% to $126 billion ‌in 2026 and a further 7.3% to $135 billion in ‌2027, as chipmakers expand capacity for logic and memory chips used in artificial intelligence, industry group SEMI forecast on Tuesday.

headline: Top 6 chip stocks to buy for 2026, according to this semiconductor analyst
summary: Investing.com -- In a note to clients on Tuesday, Bank of America analyst Vivek Arya named six large-cap stocks he believes are best positioned to outperform as spending on AI infrastructure accelerates.
